articles.author: Laila Bassam, Humeyra Pamuk
articles.description: Reuters witnesses heard two blasts and saw plumes of smoke emerging from two separate neighbourhoods.
articles.title: Israeli strike rocks Beirut after US says it opposes scope of air assault

articles.author: Simon Scarr
articles.description: An invisible detonator and wafer-thin plastic explosives turned batteries into bombs
articles.title: How Israel’s bulky pager fooled Hezbollah

articles.author: Nidal Al-Mughrabi
articles.description: Palestinian health officials called on Wednesday for a humanitarian corridor to three hospitals in northern Gaza that have come close to collapse as Israeli troops have cut off the area during almost two weeks of heavy fighting against Hamas.
articles.title: North Gaza hospitals say food, medicines running out as Israel presses offensive

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Canada's nearly 800,000 Sikhs have links to the northern state, where their religion was founded more than 500 years ago.
articles.title: Indians in Punjab fear dispute with Canada endangers work, study plans

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: NATO will make a fresh push for common munitions standards, a senior NATO official said, aiming to drive down costs and improve ease of use on the battlefield as the alliance draws lessons from Russia's war on Ukraine.
articles.title: NATO to make fresh push for common arms standards

articles.author: Joe Cash, Ben Blanchard
articles.description: China will not promise to renounce the use of force over Taiwan but this is aimed at external interference and a small minority of separatists, China's Taiwan Affairs Office said on Wednesday following the country's latest war games around the island.
articles.title: China says it will not renounce use of force over Taiwan

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Russia launched a series of drone and missile attacks overnight targeting Kyiv and other Ukrainian cities, igniting a fire at an industrial facility in the western Ukrainian region of Ternopil, Ukrainian officials said on Wednesday.
articles.title: Russia launches scores of drones on Kyiv, other Ukrainian regions

articles.author: Luc Cohen
articles.description: Genaro Garcia Luna, who for several years led Mexico's fight against the country's violent drug trade, is set to be sentenced on Wednesday over his U.S. criminal conviction for accepting bribes from the cartels he was supposed to fight.
articles.title: Mexico ex-drug czar to be sentenced over bribes from cartels

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: President Volodymyr Zelenskiy was expected to unveil his much anticipated "Victory Plan" to the Ukrainian parliament on Wednesday, after discussing it with his key Western allies during a set of quickfire trips in recent weeks.
articles.title: Zelenskiy to present 'Victory Plan' to Ukraine's parliament

articles.author: Jonathan Spicer
articles.description: Any solution to the rapidly expanding regional conflict that has spread to Lebanon and beyond hinges on a resolution of the original crisis in Gaza, a senior Hamas official said on Wednesday.
articles.title: No end to widening Mideast conflict without Gaza resolution, Hamas official says
